verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* ye \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* doth \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* keepeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* keepeth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* stranger, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* adhereth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w speak|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w divide|strong="H0914"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w eunuch|strong="H5631"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*, \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* please \w me|strong="H2388"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stranger \w that|strong="H3605"\w* adhere \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* worship \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* keepeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* holdeth \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*:

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*: \w their|strong="H3605"\w* holocausts, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* victims \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w please|strong="H7522"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* gathereth \w the|strong="H5002"\w* scattered \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, saith: \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* unto \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* congregation.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w come|strong="H0857"\w* \w to|strong="H7704"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.

\w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ignorant: dumb \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w bark|strong="H5024"\w*, seeing vain \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w sleeping|strong="H5123"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w loving|strong="H0157"\w* dreams.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* meet impudent \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* enough: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* aside \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w after|strong="H7097"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*, \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* first \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* last.

\w Come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* filled \w with|strong="H3117"\w* drunkenness: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w also|strong="H2088"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w much|strong="H1419"\w* \w more|strong="H3966"\w*.
